name: Chen Wei
routine: Chen Wei sleeps around 11:30 pm and wakes up at 7:00 am to get to his engineering job.
occupation: Chen Wei is a civil engineer who works on infrastructure projects, with a steady 9-to-5 job at a construction company.
thoughts: Chen Wei spent the weekend of 2024-02-03 assisting in the planning of his sister's wedding, which, despite the stress, he enjoyed thoroughly.
lifestyle: Chen prefers a minimalistic home environment and engages in evening indoor rock climbing sessions for his health and pleasure.

name: Sunita Verma
routine: Sunita Verma sleeps by 12 am and wakes at 7 am to prepare her kids for school.
occupation: Sunita Verma is a software developer who often works remotely to balance her job and household responsibilities.
thoughts: She's excited about her daughter's dance recital scheduled for February 1st, 2024.
lifestyle: Sunita leads a busy, family-oriented lifestyle and prefers cooking at home over dining out.

name: Leila Zahra
routine: Leila is a night owl, often sleeping at 2am and waking up at 10am, just in time for her college classes.
occupation: She's an undergraduate studying International Relations with a keen interest in humanitarian work.
thoughts: Leila has been excited about the Model UN event scheduled for February 2nd, 2024, where she will represent her views on global peace.
lifestyle: She enjoys a vibrant dorm life, is always eager to try out new cuisines, and stays active by participating in campus social events.
